description: Formal observations request by Royal Borough of Greenwich on amended drawings (location and layout of non-residential units, design of residential units, amenity space, cycle storage, and PV panels), updated internal Daylight and Sunlight Assessment, additional information and landscaping details, and addendum to Environmental Statement for a mixed-use development to provide 619 residential dwellings (Class C3 use), retail use (Class A1/A3 uses), business use (Class B1 use), a nursery (Class D1 use), new bus station interchange and residential squares and other public realm, hard and soft landscaping, highways works including bus stop provision, parking, access and servicing arrangements, plant and associated works.
site_name: KIDBROOK STATION SQUARE, HENLEY CROSS, KIDBROOKE, LONDON, SE3
